title: S8E15 – "Torturous Tributes" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three spine-chilling tales from author Christopher Howard "Slimebeast" Wolf, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about dastardly deliveries, carnivorous coffers, covetous killers, and mysterious monsters.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
